properties.name: rootElementRef
properties.description: The react ref of the grid root container div element.

properties.name: columnHeadersContainerElementRef
properties.description: The react ref of the grid column container virtualized div element.

properties.name: columnHeadersElementRef
properties.description: The react ref of the grid column headers container element.

properties.name: windowRef
properties.description: The react ref of the grid window container element.

properties.name: renderingZoneRef
properties.description: The react ref of the grid data rendering zone.

properties.name: headerRef
properties.description: The react ref of the grid header element.

properties.name: footerRef
properties.description: The react ref of the grid footer element.

properties.name: unstable_eventManager
properties.description: The generic event emitter manager.

properties.name: subscribeEvent
properties.description: Registers a handler for an event.
properties.type: <E extends "resize" | "debouncedResize" | "viewportInnerSizeChange" | "componentError" | "unmount" | "cellModeChange" | "cellClick" | "cellDoubleClick" | "cellMouseDown" | "cellMouseUp" | ... 53 more ... | "columnVisibilityChange">(event: E, handler: GridEventListener<...>, options?: EventListenerOptions | undefined...

properties.name: publishEvent
properties.description: Emits an event.

properties.name: showError
properties.description: Displays the error overlay component.

properties.name: state
properties.description: Property that contains the whole state of the grid.

properties.name: setState
properties.description: Sets the whole state of the grid.

properties.name: forceUpdate
properties.description: Forces the grid to rerender. It's often used after a state update.

properties.name: unstable_registerPreProcessor
properties.description: Register a pre-processor and emit an event to notify the agents to re-apply the pre-processors.
properties.type: (group: GridPreProcessingGroup, id: string, callback: PreProcessorCallback) => () => void

properties.name: unstable_applyPreProcessors
properties.description: Apply on the value the pre-processors registered on the given group.
properties.type: (group: GridPreProcessingGroup, value: any, params?: any) => any

properties.name: unstable_registerRowGroupsBuilder
properties.description: Register a column pre-processing and emit an event to re-apply the row grouping pre-processing.

properties.name: unstable_groupRows
properties.description: Apply the first row grouping pre-processing that does not return null.

properties.name: setDensity
properties.description: Sets the density of the grid.
properties.type: (density: GridDensity, headerHeight?: number | undefined, rowHeight?: number | undefined) => void

properties.name: resize
properties.description: Triggers a resize of the component and recalculation of width and height.

properties.name: getRootDimensions
properties.description: Returns the dimensions of the grid

properties.name: unstable_getViewportPageSize
properties.description: Returns the amount of rows that are currently visible in the viewport

properties.name: getRowModels
properties.description: Gets the full set of rows as [[Map<GridRowId, GridRowModel>]].

properties.name: getRowsCount
properties.description: Gets the total number of rows in the grid.

properties.name: getAllRowIds
properties.description: Gets the list of row ids.

properties.name: setRows
properties.description: Sets a new set of rows.

properties.name: updateRows
properties.description: Allows to updates, insert and delete rows in a single call.

properties.name: getRow
properties.description: Gets the row data with a given id.

properties.name: getRowNode
properties.description: Gets the row node from the internal tree structure.

properties.name: setRowChildrenExpansion
properties.description: Expand or collapse a row children.

properties.name: setEditRowsModel
properties.description: Set the edit rows model of the grid.

properties.name: getEditRowsModel
properties.description: Gets the edit rows model of the grid.

properties.name: setCellMode
properties.description: Sets the mode of a cell.
properties.type: (id: GridRowId, field: string, mode: GridCellMode) => void

properties.name: getCellMode
properties.description: Gets the mode of a cell.

properties.name: setRowMode
properties.description: Sets the mode of a row.

properties.name: getRowMode
properties.description: Gets the mode of a row.

properties.name: isCellEditable
properties.description: Controls if a cell is editable.

properties.name: setEditCellValue
properties.description:
Sets the value of the edit cell.
Commonly used inside the edit cell component.

properties.name: commitCellChange
properties.description: Updates the field at the given id with the value stored in the edit row model.
properties.type: (params: GridCommitCellChangeParams, event?: MuiBaseEvent | undefined) => boolean | Promise<boolean>

properties.name: commitRowChange
properties.description: Updates the row at the given id with the values stored in the edit row model.
properties.type: (id: GridRowId, event?: MuiBaseEvent | undefined) => boolean | Promise<boolean>

properties.name: getCellValue
properties.description: Gets the value of a cell at the given id and field.

properties.name: getCellElement
properties.description: Gets the underlying DOM element for a cell at the given id and field.

properties.name: getCellParams
properties.description: Gets the [[GridCellParams]] object that is passed as argument in events.
properties.type: (id: GridRowId, field: string) => GridCellParams<any, any, any>

properties.name: getRowParams
properties.description: Gets the [[GridRowParams]] object that is passed as argument in events.

properties.name: getRowElement
properties.description: Gets the underlying DOM element for a row at the given id.

properties.name: getColumnHeaderElement
properties.description: Gets the underlying DOM element for the column header with the given field.

properties.name: getColumnHeaderParams
properties.description: Gets the [[GridColumnHeaderParams]] object that is passed as argument in events.

properties.name: getColumn
properties.description: Returns the [[GridColDef]] for the given field.

properties.name: getAllColumns
properties.description: Returns an array of [[GridColDef]] containing all the column definitions.

properties.name: getVisibleColumns
properties.description: Returns the currently visible columns.

properties.name: getColumnsMeta
properties.description: Returns the [[GridColumnsMeta]] for each column.

properties.name: getColumnIndex
properties.description: Returns the index position of a column. By default, only the visible columns are considered. Pass false to useVisibleColumns to consider all columns.

properties.name: getColumnPosition
properties.description: Returns the left-position of a column relative to the inner border of the grid.

properties.name: updateColumn
properties.description: Updates the definition of a column.

properties.name: updateColumns
properties.description: Updates the definition of multiple columns at the same time.

properties.name: setColumnVisibility
properties.description: Changes the visibility of the column referred by field.

properties.name: setColumnIndex
properties.description: Moves a column from its original position to the position given by targetIndexPosition.

properties.name: setColumnWidth
properties.description: Updates the width of a column.

properties.name: selectRow
properties.description: Change the selection state of a row.
properties.type: (id: GridRowId, isSelected?: boolean | undefined, resetSelection?: boolean | undefined) => void

properties.name: selectRows
properties.description: Change the selection state of multiple rows.
properties.type: (ids: GridRowId[], isSelected?: boolean | undefined, resetSelection?: boolean | undefined) => void

properties.name: selectRowRange
properties.description: Change the selection state of all the selectable rows in a range.
properties.type: (range: { startId: GridRowId; endId: GridRowId; }, isSelected?: boolean | undefined, resetSelection?: boolean | undefined) => void

properties.name: isRowSelected
properties.description: Determines if a row is selected or not.

properties.name: getSelectedRows
properties.description: Returns an array of the selected rows.

properties.name: setSelectionModel
properties.description: Updates the selected rows to be those passed to the rowIds argument. Any row already selected will be unselected.

properties.name: getSortModel
properties.description: Returns the sort model currently applied to the grid.

properties.name: applySorting
properties.description: Applies the current sort model to the rows.

properties.name: setSortModel
properties.description: Updates the sort model and triggers the sorting of rows.

properties.name: sortColumn
properties.description: Sorts a column.
properties.type: (column: GridColDef, direction?: GridSortDirection, allowMultipleSorting?: boolean | undefined) => void

properties.name: getSortedRows
properties.description: Returns all rows sorted according to the active sort model.

properties.name: getSortedRowIds
properties.description: Returns all row ids sorted according to the active sort model.

properties.name: getRowIdFromRowIndex
properties.description: Gets the GridRowId of a row at a specific index. The index is based on the sorted but unfiltered row list.

properties.name: getRowIndex
properties.description:
Gets the row index of a row with a given id.
The index is based on the sorted but unfiltered row list.

properties.name: setPage
properties.description: Sets the displayed page to the value given by page.

properties.name: setPageSize
properties.description: Sets the number of displayed rows to the value given by pageSize.

properties.name: getDataAsCsv
properties.description: Returns the grid data as a CSV string. This method is used internally by exportDataAsCsv.

properties.name: exportDataAsCsv
properties.description: Downloads and exports a CSV of the grid's data.

properties.name: setCellFocus
properties.description: Sets the focus to the cell at the given id and field.

properties.name: setColumnHeaderFocus
properties.description: Sets the focus to the column header at the given field.

properties.name: showFilterPanel
properties.description: Shows the filter panel. If targetColumnField is given, a filter for this field is also added.

properties.name: hideFilterPanel
properties.description: Hides the filter panel.

properties.name: upsertFilterItem
properties.description: Updates or inserts a [[GridFilterItem]].

properties.name: unstable_applyFilters
properties.description: Applies all filters on all rows.

properties.name: deleteFilterItem
properties.description: Deletes a [[GridFilterItem]].

properties.name: setFilterLinkOperator
properties.description: Changes the [[GridLinkOperator]] used to connect the filters.

properties.name: setFilterModel
properties.description: Sets the filter model to the one given by model.

properties.name: getVisibleRowModels
properties.description: Returns a sorted Map containing only the visible rows.

properties.name: showColumnMenu
properties.description: Display the column menu under the field column.

properties.name: hideColumnMenu
properties.description: Hides the column menu that is open.

properties.name: toggleColumnMenu
properties.description: Toggles the column menu under the field column.

properties.name: showPreferences
properties.description: Displays the preferences panel. The newValue argument controls the content of the panel.

properties.name: hidePreferences
properties.description: Hides the preferences panel.

properties.name: exportDataAsPrint
properties.description: Print the grid's data.

properties.name: unstable_disableVirtualization
properties.description: Disables grid's virtualization.

properties.name: unstable_enableVirtualization
properties.description: Enables grid's virtualization.

properties.name: getLocaleText
properties.description: Returns the translation for the key.

properties.name: unstable_updateControlState
properties.description: Updates a control state that binds the model, the onChange prop, and the grid state together.

properties.name: unstable_applyControlStateConstraint
properties.description: Allows the internal grid state to apply the registered control state constraint.

properties.name: unstable_copySelectedRowsToClipboard
properties.description:
Copies the selected rows to the clipboard.
The fields will separated by the TAB character.

properties.name: scroll
properties.description: Triggers the viewport to scroll to the given positions (in pixels).

properties.name: getScrollPosition
properties.description: Returns the current scroll position.

properties.name: scrollToIndexes
properties.description: Triggers the viewport to scroll to the cell at indexes given by params. Returns true if the grid had to scroll to reach the target.
